name: ZooCoin
description: Q: What is the project about? A: Zoo is an ecosystem of decentralized applications. Our main ideas: USEFUL We provide unique solutions for people to manage their crypto investments EXPANDING Our products encourage people to use Fantom & develop more cool apps on it FAIR Attract wide spectrum of new users by making crypto investments fair & transparent Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are working with Lif3.com to build out new products with them, and improve on existing technology. What can your token be used for? Utility token to use charts, governance token for the protocol, and reward token for dex aggregator. History of the project: The ZooCoin ecosystem was an integral part of the Fantom Ecosystem during the last bull cycle, as it provided state-of-the-art Charting, Fantom's first DEX Aggregator and NFT platform. The project reached 30,000,000 TVL at the height, and token went to $0.10!
